original_text: After the Pharisees heard this, they thought about what they could do. They wanted to ask Jesus difficult questions. They wanted to make him say something wrong about the Roman ruler.
korean_text: 이에 바리새인들이 가서 어떻게 하면 예수를 말의 올무에 걸리게 할까 상의하고

sentences.original_text: they thought about what they could do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무엇을 할 수 있을지 생각했습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to ask Jesus difficult questions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수께 어려운 질문을 하고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to make him say something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 잘못된 말을 하게 만들고 싶었습니다
